and it will come to pass [that]
vengeance shall be taken on him
and I will look on it
Therefore it will come to pass
then I will go to the right
then I will go to the left
and they went on their way
And when dealt harshly with her
in which you are a stranger
and he who is bought with
I have taken it upon myself
and he acting as a judge
you are as good as dead
but that according to the kindness
and I will make you swear
And let it come to pass
and it shall come to pass that [when]
so that he could not see
then I shall seem to be
and it shall come to pass
and he lay down to sleep
and I will bring you back
that you have stolen away unknown
for I might have sent you away
you would have sent me away
and you were pleased with me
and if they are driven hard
has caused me to be fruitful
do you look at one another
but he acted as a stranger
And they bowed down their heads
and when it will come to pass
then I shall bear the blame
And it shall come to pass
and I will make of you
